  8    def __init__(self):
  9        # default parameters g=3, b=1.41, h=1, a=1.41, alpha=45 degrees, theta=0, p_pos=25%, p_off=30%, dt=0.025 s,
 10        # alpha_dot=20 degrees/s 
 11        self.linkage = FourBarLinkage(3., 1.41, 1., 1.41, 45., 0., 0.25, 0.3, 0.025, 20)
 12        # calculate all geometric values
 13        self.linkage.run()
 14        # initialize GUI
 15        self.tk = tk.Tk()
 16        self.width = round(0.8*self.tk.winfo_screenwidth())
 17        self.height = round(0.8*self.tk.winfo_screenheight())
 18        self.tk.geometry(f"{self.width}x{self.height}")
 19        self.tk.title("Four-bar linkage model")
 20        # frame for linkage
 21        self.model_frame = tk.Frame(self.tk, width=round(0.7*self.width),
 22                                    height=round(0.6*self.height))
 23        self.model_frame.grid(sticky="W", row=0, column=0)
 24        width = round(0.7*self.width)
 25        height = round(0.9*self.height)
 26        # canvas to display linkage
 27        self.model_animation = tk.Canvas(self.model_frame, width=width,
 28                                         height=height)
 29        self.model_animation.width = width
 30        self.model_animation.height = height
 31        self.model_animation.grid(sticky="W", row=0, column=0)
 32        # toolbar
 33        width = round(0.3*self.width)
 34        self.toolbar_frame = tk.Frame(self.tk, width=width,
 35                                      height=height)
 36        self.toolbar_frame.width = width
 37        self.toolbar_frame.height = height
 38        self.toolbar_frame.grid(sticky="W", row=0, column=1)
 39        # generate picture
 40        self.init_toolbar()
 41        self.init_linkage_display()
 42        # trace is disabled
 43        self.trace_C = False
 44        self.trace_D = False
 45        self.trace_P = False
 46        # positions to trace them
 47        self.positions_C = []
 48        self.positions_D = []
 49        self.positions_P = []
 50        # for optimization problem A and x-, y-axis are not coplaced
 51        self.x_axis = 170
 52        self.y_axis = 220
 53        # position of A in new coordinates
 54        self.A_x = 0.
 55        self.A_y = 0.
 56        # to move box in optimization problem
 57        self.pin_box_to_coupler = False
 58        self.prev_coupler_position = None
 59        self.prev_box_position = None

307    # display classification values T1, T2, T3, L
308    def display_classification_values(self):
309        self.text_classification_values.delete('1.0', tk.END)
310        self.text_classification_values.insert(tk.END, f'T1 = g + h - b - a: {round(self.linkage.T1,3)}')
311        self.text_classification_values.insert(tk.END, f'\nT2 = b + g - h - a: {round(self.linkage.T2,3)}')
312        self.text_classification_values.insert(tk.END, f'\nT3 = h + b - g - a: {round(self.linkage.T3,3)}')
313        self.text_classification_values.insert(tk.END, f'\nL  = g + b + h + a: {round(self.linkage.L,3)}')        
314        
315    # display bars values a,b,g,h
316    def display_bars_values(self):
317        self.text_bars_values.delete('1.0', tk.END)
318        self.text_bars_values.insert(tk.END, f'a = {round(self.linkage.DA,3)}')
319        self.text_bars_values.insert(tk.END, f'\ng = {round(self.linkage.AB,3)}')
320        self.text_bars_values.insert(tk.END, f'\nb = {round(self.linkage.BC,3)}')
321        self.text_bars_values.insert(tk.END, f'\nh = {round(self.linkage.CD,3)}')

323    # display Input_Link_Type, Output_Link_Type, Linkage_Type

326        self.text_information.insert(tk.END, f'Input Link Type: {self.linkage.Input_Link_Type}')
327        self.text_information.insert(tk.END, f'\nOutput Link Type: {self.linkage.Output_Link_Type}')
328        self.text_information.insert(tk.END, f'\nLinkage Type: {self.linkage.Linkage_Type}')

331    # this function is used to make sure that the four bar linkage model fit in GUI frame
332    def scaling_factor(self):
333        # fix scale for optimization problem
334        if self.enable_optimization_problem.get():
335            scale = min(float(self.model_animation.width)/400,
336                        float(self.model_animation.height)/350)
337            return scale
338        # max length in x direction
339        # links AB and CD
340        max_x = np.abs(np.cos(self.linkage.theta_rad))*max(self.linkage.AB, self.linkage.CD)
341        # links DA and BC
342        horizontal_value = max(self.linkage.DA, self.linkage.BC)
343        # always factor of two for symmetry of generated picture
344        max_x += 2*horizontal_value
345        # point P
346        max_x += 2*max(np.sqrt(self.linkage.coupler_position**2 +\
347                               self.linkage.coupler_offset**2)*self.linkage.CD, 0.0)
348        # max length in y direction
349        # links AB and CD
350        max_y = np.abs(np.sin(self.linkage.theta_rad))*max(self.linkage.AB, self.linkage.CD)
351        # links DA and BC
352        vertical_value = max(self.linkage.DA, self.linkage.BC)
353        # always factor of two for symmetry of generated picture
354        max_y += 2*vertical_value
355        # point P
356        max_y += 2*max(np.sqrt(self.linkage.coupler_position**2 +\
357                               self.linkage.coupler_offset**2)*self.linkage.CD, 0.0)
358        # scaling factor for point coordinates
359        scale = min(float(self.model_animation.width)/max_x,
360                    float(self.model_animation.height)/max_y)
361        return scale
362    
363    # normalities to 4 linkage bars, used to display bar's names
364    def calculate_normalities(self):
365        AB = self.linkage.B - self.linkage.A
366        BC = self.linkage.C - self.linkage.B
367        CD = self.linkage.D - self.linkage.C
368        DA = self.linkage.A - self.linkage.D
369        n_AB = [AB[1], -AB[0]]/np.linalg.norm(AB)
370        n_BC = [BC[1], -BC[0]]/np.linalg.norm(BC)
371        n_CD = [CD[1], -CD[0]]/np.linalg.norm(CD)
372        n_DA = [DA[1], -DA[0]]/np.linalg.norm(DA)
373        return n_AB, n_BC, n_CD, n_DA
374
375    # functions for sliders to update parameters
376    def update_parameter_a(self, val):
377        self.linkage.DA = float(val)
378        self.delete_tracing()
379        self.refresh()
380    def update_parameter_g(self, val):
381        self.linkage.AB = float(val)
382        self.delete_tracing()
383        self.refresh()

385        self.linkage.BC = float(val)
386        self.delete_tracing()
387        self.refresh()
388    def update_parameter_h(self, val):
389        self.linkage.CD = float(val)
390        self.delete_tracing()
391        self.refresh()
392    def update_parameter_p_pos(self, val):
393        self.linkage.coupler_position = float(val)/100
394        self.delete_tracing()
395        self.refresh()

438    # refresh the GUI
439    def refresh(self):
440        # set new alpha limits
441        self.update_alpha_limits()
442        # calculate points position
443        self.linkage.run()
444        # display info on toolbar
445        self.display_classification_values()
446        self.display_bars_values()
447        self.display_information()
448        # generate new picture
449        self.update_linkage_display()

451    # generate default linkage
452    def reset(self):
453        if self.enable_optimization_problem.get():
454            # solution of optimization problem
455            self.linkage = FourBarLinkage(172.1, 171.2, 122.6, 124.0, 45., -70., 0.2, 0.42, 0.025, 20)
456            self.A_x = 27.0
457            self.A_y = 66.0
458            self.reset_A_x_A_y()
459            self.linkage.direction = 1
460        else:
461            # default config
462            self.linkage = FourBarLinkage(3., 1.41, 1., 1.41, 45., 0., 0.25, 0.3, 0.025, 20)
463        # reset all the sliders and info
464        self.reset_bars_sliders()
465        self.reset_classifications_sliders()
466        # delete saved tracing info
467        self.delete_tracing()
468        # generate new image
469        self.refresh()

500        if self.input_classification_values.get():

502            self.hide_classification_values()
503            self.show_classification_sliders()
504            self.show_bars_values()
505            self.reset_classifications_sliders()
506            self.display_bars_values()
507        else:
508            self.hide_classification_sliders()
509            self.hide_bars_values()
510            self.show_bars_sliders()
511            self.show_classification_values()
512            self.reset_bars_sliders()
513            self.display_classification_values()

664    # function to initialize animation
665    def animation(self):
666        self.run_animation()

668    # repeated function to animate movement
669    def run_animation(self):
670        if self.enable_animation.get():
671            self.linkage.animation_alpha()
672            self.refresh()
673            self.tk.after(25, self.run_animation)

700        self.positions_P = []

702    def update_linkage_display(self):
703        # check if setup is valid
704        if self.linkage.geometric_Validity:
705            # show linkage
706            self.show_linkage()
707            if self.enable_optimization_problem.get():
708                # show optimization problem
709                self.show_optimization_problem()
710            # hide error message
711            self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.invalid_text, state='hidden')
712        else:
713            # hide linkage
714            self.hide_linkage()
715            # hide optimization problem
716            self.hide_optimization_problem()
717            # show error message
718            self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.invalid_text, state='normal')
719            return
720        
721        # scaling factor to transfrom spatial coordinates to pixels
722        scale = self.scaling_factor()
723        # Mid point in AB should be always placed in center for symmetry (except of optimization problem)
724        AB_mid = (self.linkage.A + self.linkage.B)/2
725        AB_mid_x = round(self.model_animation.width/2)
726        AB_mid_y = round(self.model_animation.height/2)
727        # Point A is a bias and positioned relative to AB_mid
728        A_x = 0
729        A_y = 0
730        # in case of optimization problem A_x and A_y are moved with respect to coordinates x, y
731        if self.enable_optimization_problem.get():
732            x = round(self.x_axis*scale)
733            y = round(self.y_axis*scale)
734            A_x = round(self.A_x*scale) + x
735            A_y = - round(self.A_y*scale) + y
736        else:
737            A_x = round(AB_mid_x - AB_mid[0]*scale)
738            A_y = round(AB_mid_y + AB_mid[1]*scale)
739        # Point B relative to A
740        B_x = round(A_x + (self.linkage.B[0]-self.linkage.A[0])*scale)
741        B_y = round(A_y - (self.linkage.B[1]-self.linkage.A[1])*scale)
742        # Point C relative to A
743        C_x = round(A_x + (self.linkage.C[0]-self.linkage.A[0])*scale)
744        C_y = round(A_y - (self.linkage.C[1]-self.linkage.A[1])*scale)
745        # Point D relative to A
746        D_x = round(A_x + (self.linkage.D[0]-self.linkage.A[0])*scale)
747        D_y = round(A_y - (self.linkage.D[1]-self.linkage.A[1])*scale)
748        # Point P relative to A
749        P_x = round(A_x + (self.linkage.P[0]-self.linkage.A[0])*scale)
750        P_y = round(A_y - (self.linkage.P[1]-self.linkage.A[1])*scale)
751        
752        # show optimization problem
753        if self.enable_optimization_problem.get():
754            # axis position
755            x = round(self.x_axis*scale)
756            y = round(self.y_axis*scale)
757            # generate all figures and text
758            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.movement_line, [0, y, self.model_animation.width, y])
759            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.x_axis, [x, y, x, y-40*scale])
760            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.x_0, [x, y+5*scale, x, y+25*scale])
761            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.x_0_text, [x+10*scale, y+15*scale])
762            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.x_220, [x+220*scale, y+5*scale, x+220*scale, y+25*scale])
763            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.x_220_text, [x+235*scale, y+15*scale])
764            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.y_axis, [x, y, x+40*scale, y])
765            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.label_rectangle, [x+80*scale, y-70*scale, x-160*scale, y-120*scale])
766            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.labelling_machine_text, [x-40*scale, y-95*scale])
767            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.text_80_70, [x+95*scale, y-70*scale])
768            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.point_1, [x+119*scale, y-81*scale, x+121*scale, y-79*scale])
769            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.text_120_80, [x+120*scale, y-87*scale])
770            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.point_2, [x+219*scale, y-81*scale, x+221*scale, y-79*scale])
771            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.text_220_80, [x+221*scale, y-87*scale])
772            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.box_rectangle_dashed, [x+140*scale, y, x+220*scale, y-60*scale])
773            # save previous box position
774            if self.prev_box_position is None:
775                self.prev_box_position = [x+140*scale, y, x+220*scale, y-60*scale]
776            # position of text "Box"
777            box_text_position = [round((self.prev_box_position[0]+self.prev_box_position[2])/2),
778                                 round((self.prev_box_position[1]+self.prev_box_position[3])/2)]
779            # decide if box is moved by coupler or remains at place
780            if self.pin_box_to_coupler and self.prev_coupler_position is not None:
781                # save next box position
782                self.prev_box_position = [P_x-80*scale, y, P_x, y-60*scale]
783                self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.box_rectangle, self.prev_box_position)
784                self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.box_text, box_text_position)
785                # unpin box
786                if self.prev_coupler_position[0] < P_x:
787                    self.pin_box_to_coupler = False
788                if P_y > y or P_y < y - 60*scale:
789                    self.pin_box_to_coupler = False
790            else:
791                self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.box_rectangle, self.prev_box_position)
792                self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.box_text, box_text_position)
793                # pin box
794                if self.prev_coupler_position is not None and self.prev_coupler_position[0] >= x+220*scale and \
795                   P_x <= x+220*scale and P_y <= y and P_y >= y - 60*scale:
796                    self.pin_box_to_coupler = True
797        
798        # tracing
799        # number of points to trace (factor of 10 makes sure to save full trajectory)
800        N_points = 10*round((self.linkage.alpha_lims[1]-self.linkage.alpha_lims[0])/ \
801                   (self.linkage.alpha_velocity * self.linkage.t))
802        # trace C
803        if self.trace_C:
804            if len(self.positions_C)<=N_points:
805                self.positions_C.append(C_x)
806                self.positions_C.append(C_y)
807            if len(self.positions_C)>2:
808                # show C trajectory
809                self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.trace_C, state='normal')
810                self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.trace_C, self.positions_C)
811            else:
812                self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.trace_C, state='hidden')
813        else:
814            # hide C trajectory
815            self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.trace_C, state='hidden')
816        # trace D
817        if self.trace_D:
818            if len(self.positions_D)<=N_points:
819                self.positions_D.append(D_x)
820                self.positions_D.append(D_y)
821            if len(self.positions_D)>2:
822                # show D trajectory
823                self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.trace_D, state='normal')
824                self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.trace_D, self.positions_D)
825            else:
826                # hide D trajectory
827                self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.trace_D, state='hidden')
828        else:
829            self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.trace_D, state='hidden')
830        # trace P   
831        if self.trace_P:
832            if len(self.positions_P)<=N_points:
833                self.positions_P.append(P_x)
834                self.positions_P.append(P_y)
835            if len(self.positions_P)>2:
836                # show P trajectory
837                self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.trace_P, state='normal')
838                self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.trace_P, self.positions_P)
839            else:
840                # hide P trajectory
841                self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.trace_P, state='hidden')
842        else:
843            self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.trace_P, state='hidden')
844
845        # update arc alpha
846        radius_alpha = round(min(self.width/30, self.linkage.AB*scale, self.linkage.DA*scale))
847        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.alpha_arc, [A_x-radius_alpha, A_y-radius_alpha,
848                                                                     A_x+radius_alpha, A_y+radius_alpha])
849        self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.alpha_arc, extent=self.linkage.alpha)
850        
851        # update arc theta
852        radius_theta = round(min(self.width/20, self.linkage.AB*scale))
853        # show only if theta is non zero
854        if self.linkage.theta!=0:            
855            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.theta_arc, [A_x-radius_theta, A_y-radius_theta,
856                                                                         A_x+radius_theta, A_y+radius_theta])
857            self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.theta_arc, extent=self.linkage.theta)
858        else:
859            self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.theta_arc, state='hidden')
860            
861        # update horizontal line
862        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.horizont_line, [A_x, A_y, A_x+3*radius_alpha, A_y])
863        
864        # update bars
865        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.AB_line, [A_x, A_y, B_x, B_y])
866        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.BC_line, [B_x, B_y, C_x, C_y])
867        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.CD_line, [C_x, C_y, D_x, D_y])
868        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.DA_line, [D_x, D_y, A_x, A_y])
869        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.CP_line, [C_x, C_y, P_x, P_y])
870        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.PD_line, [P_x, P_y, D_x, D_y])
871    
872        # update point's names
873        delta_x = round(0.012*self.model_animation.width)
874        delta_y = round(0.012*self.model_animation.height)
875        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.A_text, [A_x-delta_x, A_y+delta_y])
876        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.B_text, [B_x+delta_x, B_y+delta_y])
877        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.C_text, [C_x+delta_x, C_y-delta_y])
878        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.D_text, [D_x-delta_x, D_y-delta_y])
879        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.P_text, [P_x, P_y-np.sqrt(delta_y*delta_y+delta_x*delta_x)])
880        
881        # update angle's names
882        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.alpha_text,
883                                    [A_x + radius_alpha*np.cos(self.linkage.alpha_rad/2)+10,
884                                     A_y - radius_alpha*np.sin(self.linkage.alpha_rad/2)])
885        if self.linkage.theta!=0.0: 
886            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.theta_text,
887                                        [A_x + radius_theta*np.cos(self.linkage.theta_rad/2)+10,
888                                         A_y - radius_theta*np.sin(self.linkage.theta_rad/2)])
889        else:
890            self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.theta_text, state='hidden')
891        
892        # update bar's names
893        radius_names = round(scale*min(self.linkage.AB, self.linkage.BC, self.linkage.CD,
894                                       self.linkage.DA)/10)
895        # normalities to all bars to show their names
896        g, b, h, a = self.calculate_normalities()
897        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.DA_text, [round(radius_names*a[0]+(A_x+D_x)/2),
898                                                                   round(-radius_names*a[1]+(A_y+D_y)/2)])
899        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.AB_text, [round(radius_names*g[0]+(A_x+B_x)/2),
900                                                                   round(-radius_names*g[1]+(A_y+B_y)/2)])
901        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.BC_text, [round(radius_names*b[0]+(C_x+B_x)/2),
902                                                                   round(-radius_names*b[1]+(C_y+B_y)/2)])
903        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.CD_text, [round(radius_names*h[0]+(C_x+D_x)/2),
904                                                                   round(-radius_names*h[1]+(C_y+D_y)/2)])
905        
906        # save previous coupler position
907        self.prev_coupler_position = [P_x, P_y]
908        
909    # change slider limits for optimization problem
910    def change_slider_limits_optimization_problem(self):
911        self.slider_a.configure(from_=1., to=200., resolution=0.1)
912        self.slider_g.configure(from_=1., to=200., resolution=0.1)
913        self.slider_b.configure(from_=1., to=200., resolution=0.1)
914        self.slider_h.configure(from_=1., to=200., resolution=0.1)
915        self.slider_T1.configure(from_=-300., to=300., resolution=0.1)
916        self.slider_T2.configure(from_=-300., to=300., resolution=0.1)
917        self.slider_T3.configure(from_=-300., to=300., resolution=0.1)
918        self.slider_L.configure(from_=1., to=800., resolution=0.1)
919        
920    # change slider limits for normal mode
921    def change_slider_limits_normal(self):
922        self.slider_a.configure(from_=0.1, to=5., resolution=0.01)
923        self.slider_g.configure(from_=0.1, to=5., resolution=0.01)
924        self.slider_b.configure(from_=0.1, to=5., resolution=0.01)
925        self.slider_h.configure(from_=0.1, to=5., resolution=0.01)
926        self.slider_T1.configure(from_=-5., to=5., resolution=0.01)
927        self.slider_T2.configure(from_=-5., to=5., resolution=0.01)
928        self.slider_T3.configure(from_=-5., to=5., resolution=0.01)
929        self.slider_L.configure(from_=0.01, to=20., resolution=0.01)
930    
931    # update limits for alpha slider
932    def update_alpha_limits(self):
933        # round alpha limits to prevent errors
934        left_limit = np.ceil(self.linkage.alpha_lims[0])
935        right_limit = np.floor(self.linkage.alpha_lims[1])
936        self.slider_alpha.configure(from_=left_limit, to=right_limit)
937        # alpha should be always in alpha_lims
938        self.linkage.calculate_alpha_lims()
939        if self.linkage.alpha < self.linkage.alpha_lims[0] or \
940           self.linkage.alpha > self.linkage.alpha_lims[1]:
941            self.linkage.alpha = (self.linkage.alpha_lims[0] + self.linkage.alpha_lims[1])/2
942            self.linkage.alpha_rad = math.radians(self.linkage.alpha)
943        self.slider_alpha.set(self.linkage.alpha)
944        
945    # configure optimization problem
946    def config_optimization_problem(self):
947        if self.enable_optimization_problem.get():
948            self.show_optimization_problem()
949            self.change_slider_limits_optimization_problem()
950            self.show_A_x_A_y()
951            self.reset_A_x_A_y()
952            
953        else:
954            self.hide_optimization_problem()
955            self.change_slider_limits_normal()
956            self.hide_A_x_A_y()
957        
958        self.reset()
959        self.refresh()
960        
961if __name__ == "__main__":
962    GUI().tk.mainloop()

class GUI:

  9    def __init__(self):
 10        # default parameters g=3, b=1.41, h=1, a=1.41, alpha=45 degrees, theta=0, p_pos=25%, p_off=30%, dt=0.025 s,
 11        # alpha_dot=20 degrees/s 
 12        self.linkage = FourBarLinkage(3., 1.41, 1., 1.41, 45., 0., 0.25, 0.3, 0.025, 20)
 13        # calculate all geometric values
 14        self.linkage.run()
 15        # initialize GUI
 16        self.tk = tk.Tk()
 17        self.width = round(0.8*self.tk.winfo_screenwidth())
 18        self.height = round(0.8*self.tk.winfo_screenheight())
 19        self.tk.geometry(f"{self.width}x{self.height}")
 20        self.tk.title("Four-bar linkage model")
 21        # frame for linkage
 22        self.model_frame = tk.Frame(self.tk, width=round(0.7*self.width),
 23                                    height=round(0.6*self.height))
 24        self.model_frame.grid(sticky="W", row=0, column=0)
 25        width = round(0.7*self.width)
 26        height = round(0.9*self.height)
 27        # canvas to display linkage
 28        self.model_animation = tk.Canvas(self.model_frame, width=width,
 29                                         height=height)
 30        self.model_animation.width = width
 31        self.model_animation.height = height
 32        self.model_animation.grid(sticky="W", row=0, column=0)
 33        # toolbar
 34        width = round(0.3*self.width)
 35        self.toolbar_frame = tk.Frame(self.tk, width=width,
 36                                      height=height)
 37        self.toolbar_frame.width = width
 38        self.toolbar_frame.height = height
 39        self.toolbar_frame.grid(sticky="W", row=0, column=1)
 40        # generate picture
 41        self.init_toolbar()
 42        self.init_linkage_display()
 43        # trace is disabled
 44        self.trace_C = False
 45        self.trace_D = False
 46        self.trace_P = False
 47        # positions to trace them
 48        self.positions_C = []
 49        self.positions_D = []
 50        self.positions_P = []
 51        # for optimization problem A and x-, y-axis are not coplaced
 52        self.x_axis = 170
 53        self.y_axis = 220
 54        # position of A in new coordinates
 55        self.A_x = 0.
 56        self.A_y = 0.
 57        # to move box in optimization problem
 58        self.pin_box_to_coupler = False
 59        self.prev_coupler_position = None
 60        self.prev_box_position = None

223        self.model_animation.box_rectangle_dashed = self.model_animation.create_rectangle(-1,-1,-1,-1, fill='', width=3, dash=(2,2))

239                                                                            fill="black",
240                                                                            font=('Helvetica 11 bold'))

242                                                                         text="x = 0",
243                                                                         fill="black",
244                                                                         font=('Helvetica 11 bold'))
245        self.model_animation.x_220_text = self.model_animation.create_text(-1,-1, 
246                                                                           text="x = 220",
247                                                                           fill="black",
248                                                                           font=('Helvetica 11 bold'))
249        self.model_animation.box_text = self.model_animation.create_text(-1,-1, 
250                                                                         text="Box",
251                                                                         fill="black",
252                                                                         font=('Helvetica 11 bold'))
253        # hide optimization problem
254        self.hide_optimization_problem()
255        
256        # trace

332    # this function is used to make sure that the four bar linkage model fit in GUI frame
333    def scaling_factor(self):
334        # fix scale for optimization problem
335        if self.enable_optimization_problem.get():
336            scale = min(float(self.model_animation.width)/400,
337                        float(self.model_animation.height)/350)
338            return scale
339        # max length in x direction
340        # links AB and CD
341        max_x = np.abs(np.cos(self.linkage.theta_rad))*max(self.linkage.AB, self.linkage.CD)
342        # links DA and BC
343        horizontal_value = max(self.linkage.DA, self.linkage.BC)
344        # always factor of two for symmetry of generated picture
345        max_x += 2*horizontal_value
346        # point P
347        max_x += 2*max(np.sqrt(self.linkage.coupler_position**2 +\
348                               self.linkage.coupler_offset**2)*self.linkage.CD, 0.0)
349        # max length in y direction
350        # links AB and CD
351        max_y = np.abs(np.sin(self.linkage.theta_rad))*max(self.linkage.AB, self.linkage.CD)
352        # links DA and BC
353        vertical_value = max(self.linkage.DA, self.linkage.BC)
354        # always factor of two for symmetry of generated picture
355        max_y += 2*vertical_value
356        # point P
357        max_y += 2*max(np.sqrt(self.linkage.coupler_position**2 +\
358                               self.linkage.coupler_offset**2)*self.linkage.CD, 0.0)
359        # scaling factor for point coordinates
360        scale = min(float(self.model_animation.width)/max_x,
361                    float(self.model_animation.height)/max_y)
362        return scale
363    
364    # normalities to 4 linkage bars, used to display bar's names
365    def calculate_normalities(self):
366        AB = self.linkage.B - self.linkage.A
367        BC = self.linkage.C - self.linkage.B
368        CD = self.linkage.D - self.linkage.C
369        DA = self.linkage.A - self.linkage.D
370        n_AB = [AB[1], -AB[0]]/np.linalg.norm(AB)
371        n_BC = [BC[1], -BC[0]]/np.linalg.norm(BC)
372        n_CD = [CD[1], -CD[0]]/np.linalg.norm(CD)
373        n_DA = [DA[1], -DA[0]]/np.linalg.norm(DA)
374        return n_AB, n_BC, n_CD, n_DA

376    # functions for sliders to update parameters
377    def update_parameter_a(self, val):
378        self.linkage.DA = float(val)
379        self.delete_tracing()
380        self.refresh()
381    def update_parameter_g(self, val):
382        self.linkage.AB = float(val)
383        self.delete_tracing()
384        self.refresh()
385    def update_parameter_b(self, val):
386        self.linkage.BC = float(val)
387        self.delete_tracing()
388        self.refresh()
389    def update_parameter_h(self, val):
390        self.linkage.CD = float(val)
391        self.delete_tracing()
392        self.refresh()
393    def update_parameter_p_pos(self, val):
394        self.linkage.coupler_position = float(val)/100
395        self.delete_tracing()
396        self.refresh()
397    def update_parameter_p_off(self, val):
398        self.linkage.coupler_offset = float(val)/100
399        self.delete_tracing()
400        self.refresh()
401    def update_parameter_alpha(self, val):
402        self.linkage.alpha = float(val)
403        self.linkage.alpha_rad = math.radians(self.linkage.alpha)
404        self.refresh()
405    def update_parameter_theta(self, val):
406        self.linkage.theta = float(val)
407        self.delete_tracing()
408        self.linkage.theta_rad = math.radians(self.linkage.theta)
409        self.refresh()
410    def update_parameter_T1(self, val):
411        self.linkage.T1 = float(val)
412        self.delete_tracing()
413        self.linkage.calculate_Edge_Value()
414        self.refresh()
415    def update_parameter_T2(self, val):
416        self.linkage.T2 = float(val)
417        self.delete_tracing()
418        self.linkage.calculate_Edge_Value()
419        self.refresh()
420    def update_parameter_T3(self, val):
421        self.linkage.T3 = float(val)
422        self.delete_tracing()
423        self.linkage.calculate_Edge_Value()
424        self.refresh()
425    def update_parameter_L(self, val):
426        self.linkage.L = float(val)
427        self.delete_tracing()
428        self.linkage.calculate_Edge_Value()
429        self.refresh()
430    def update_parameter_A_x(self, val):
431        self.A_x = float(val)
432        self.delete_tracing()
433        self.refresh()
434    def update_parameter_A_y(self, val):
435        self.A_y = float(val)
436        self.delete_tracing()
437        self.refresh()

439    # refresh the GUI
440    def refresh(self):
441        # set new alpha limits
442        self.update_alpha_limits()
443        # calculate points position
444        self.linkage.run()
445        # display info on toolbar
446        self.display_classification_values()
447        self.display_bars_values()
448        self.display_information()
449        # generate new picture
450        self.update_linkage_display()
451    
452    # generate default linkage
453    def reset(self):
454        if self.enable_optimization_problem.get():
455            # solution of optimization problem
456            self.linkage = FourBarLinkage(172.1, 171.2, 122.6, 124.0, 45., -70., 0.2, 0.42, 0.025, 20)
457            self.A_x = 27.0
458            self.A_y = 66.0
459            self.reset_A_x_A_y()
460            self.linkage.direction = 1
461        else:
462            # default config
463            self.linkage = FourBarLinkage(3., 1.41, 1., 1.41, 45., 0., 0.25, 0.3, 0.025, 20)
464        # reset all the sliders and info
465        self.reset_bars_sliders()
466        self.reset_classifications_sliders()
467        # delete saved tracing info
468        self.delete_tracing()
469        # generate new image
470        self.refresh()
471

499    # input classifiaction values instead of bar's length
500    def input_classification(self):
501        if self.input_classification_values.get():
502            self.hide_bars_sliders()
503            self.hide_classification_values()
504            self.show_classification_sliders()
505            self.show_bars_values()
506            self.reset_classifications_sliders()
507            self.display_bars_values()
508        else:
509            self.hide_classification_sliders()
510            self.hide_bars_values()
511            self.show_bars_sliders()
512            self.show_classification_values()
513            self.reset_bars_sliders()
514            self.display_classification_values()

665    # function to initialize animation
666    def animation(self):
667        self.run_animation()

669    # repeated function to animate movement
670    def run_animation(self):
671        if self.enable_animation.get():
672            self.linkage.animation_alpha()
673            self.refresh()
674            self.tk.after(25, self.run_animation)

697    # delete tracing

699        self.positions_C = []
700        self.positions_D = []
701        self.positions_P = []

703    def update_linkage_display(self):
704        # check if setup is valid
705        if self.linkage.geometric_Validity:
706            # show linkage
707            self.show_linkage()
708            if self.enable_optimization_problem.get():
709                # show optimization problem
710                self.show_optimization_problem()
711            # hide error message
712            self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.invalid_text, state='hidden')
713        else:
714            # hide linkage
715            self.hide_linkage()
716            # hide optimization problem
717            self.hide_optimization_problem()
718            # show error message
719            self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.invalid_text, state='normal')
720            return
721        
722        # scaling factor to transfrom spatial coordinates to pixels
723        scale = self.scaling_factor()
724        # Mid point in AB should be always placed in center for symmetry (except of optimization problem)
725        AB_mid = (self.linkage.A + self.linkage.B)/2
726        AB_mid_x = round(self.model_animation.width/2)
727        AB_mid_y = round(self.model_animation.height/2)
728        # Point A is a bias and positioned relative to AB_mid
729        A_x = 0
730        A_y = 0
731        # in case of optimization problem A_x and A_y are moved with respect to coordinates x, y
732        if self.enable_optimization_problem.get():
733            x = round(self.x_axis*scale)
734            y = round(self.y_axis*scale)
735            A_x = round(self.A_x*scale) + x
736            A_y = - round(self.A_y*scale) + y
737        else:
738            A_x = round(AB_mid_x - AB_mid[0]*scale)
739            A_y = round(AB_mid_y + AB_mid[1]*scale)
740        # Point B relative to A
741        B_x = round(A_x + (self.linkage.B[0]-self.linkage.A[0])*scale)
742        B_y = round(A_y - (self.linkage.B[1]-self.linkage.A[1])*scale)
743        # Point C relative to A
744        C_x = round(A_x + (self.linkage.C[0]-self.linkage.A[0])*scale)
745        C_y = round(A_y - (self.linkage.C[1]-self.linkage.A[1])*scale)
746        # Point D relative to A
747        D_x = round(A_x + (self.linkage.D[0]-self.linkage.A[0])*scale)
748        D_y = round(A_y - (self.linkage.D[1]-self.linkage.A[1])*scale)
749        # Point P relative to A
750        P_x = round(A_x + (self.linkage.P[0]-self.linkage.A[0])*scale)
751        P_y = round(A_y - (self.linkage.P[1]-self.linkage.A[1])*scale)
752        
753        # show optimization problem
754        if self.enable_optimization_problem.get():
755            # axis position
756            x = round(self.x_axis*scale)
757            y = round(self.y_axis*scale)
758            # generate all figures and text
759            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.movement_line, [0, y, self.model_animation.width, y])
760            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.x_axis, [x, y, x, y-40*scale])
761            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.x_0, [x, y+5*scale, x, y+25*scale])
762            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.x_0_text, [x+10*scale, y+15*scale])
763            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.x_220, [x+220*scale, y+5*scale, x+220*scale, y+25*scale])
764            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.x_220_text, [x+235*scale, y+15*scale])
765            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.y_axis, [x, y, x+40*scale, y])
766            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.label_rectangle, [x+80*scale, y-70*scale, x-160*scale, y-120*scale])
767            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.labelling_machine_text, [x-40*scale, y-95*scale])
768            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.text_80_70, [x+95*scale, y-70*scale])
769            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.point_1, [x+119*scale, y-81*scale, x+121*scale, y-79*scale])
770            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.text_120_80, [x+120*scale, y-87*scale])
771            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.point_2, [x+219*scale, y-81*scale, x+221*scale, y-79*scale])
772            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.text_220_80, [x+221*scale, y-87*scale])
773            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.box_rectangle_dashed, [x+140*scale, y, x+220*scale, y-60*scale])
774            # save previous box position
775            if self.prev_box_position is None:
776                self.prev_box_position = [x+140*scale, y, x+220*scale, y-60*scale]
777            # position of text "Box"
778            box_text_position = [round((self.prev_box_position[0]+self.prev_box_position[2])/2),
779                                 round((self.prev_box_position[1]+self.prev_box_position[3])/2)]
780            # decide if box is moved by coupler or remains at place
781            if self.pin_box_to_coupler and self.prev_coupler_position is not None:
782                # save next box position
783                self.prev_box_position = [P_x-80*scale, y, P_x, y-60*scale]
784                self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.box_rectangle, self.prev_box_position)
785                self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.box_text, box_text_position)
786                # unpin box
787                if self.prev_coupler_position[0] < P_x:
788                    self.pin_box_to_coupler = False
789                if P_y > y or P_y < y - 60*scale:
790                    self.pin_box_to_coupler = False
791            else:
792                self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.box_rectangle, self.prev_box_position)
793                self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.box_text, box_text_position)
794                # pin box
795                if self.prev_coupler_position is not None and self.prev_coupler_position[0] >= x+220*scale and \
796                   P_x <= x+220*scale and P_y <= y and P_y >= y - 60*scale:
797                    self.pin_box_to_coupler = True
798        
799        # tracing
800        # number of points to trace (factor of 10 makes sure to save full trajectory)
801        N_points = 10*round((self.linkage.alpha_lims[1]-self.linkage.alpha_lims[0])/ \
802                   (self.linkage.alpha_velocity * self.linkage.t))
803        # trace C
804        if self.trace_C:
805            if len(self.positions_C)<=N_points:
806                self.positions_C.append(C_x)
807                self.positions_C.append(C_y)
808            if len(self.positions_C)>2:
809                # show C trajectory
810                self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.trace_C, state='normal')
811                self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.trace_C, self.positions_C)
812            else:
813                self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.trace_C, state='hidden')
814        else:
815            # hide C trajectory
816            self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.trace_C, state='hidden')
817        # trace D
818        if self.trace_D:
819            if len(self.positions_D)<=N_points:
820                self.positions_D.append(D_x)
821                self.positions_D.append(D_y)
822            if len(self.positions_D)>2:
823                # show D trajectory
824                self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.trace_D, state='normal')
825                self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.trace_D, self.positions_D)
826            else:
827                # hide D trajectory
828                self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.trace_D, state='hidden')
829        else:
830            self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.trace_D, state='hidden')
831        # trace P   
832        if self.trace_P:
833            if len(self.positions_P)<=N_points:
834                self.positions_P.append(P_x)
835                self.positions_P.append(P_y)
836            if len(self.positions_P)>2:
837                # show P trajectory
838                self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.trace_P, state='normal')
839                self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.trace_P, self.positions_P)
840            else:
841                # hide P trajectory
842                self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.trace_P, state='hidden')
843        else:
844            self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.trace_P, state='hidden')
845
846        # update arc alpha
847        radius_alpha = round(min(self.width/30, self.linkage.AB*scale, self.linkage.DA*scale))
848        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.alpha_arc, [A_x-radius_alpha, A_y-radius_alpha,
849                                                                     A_x+radius_alpha, A_y+radius_alpha])
850        self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.alpha_arc, extent=self.linkage.alpha)
851        
852        # update arc theta
853        radius_theta = round(min(self.width/20, self.linkage.AB*scale))
854        # show only if theta is non zero
855        if self.linkage.theta!=0:            
856            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.theta_arc, [A_x-radius_theta, A_y-radius_theta,
857                                                                         A_x+radius_theta, A_y+radius_theta])
858            self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.theta_arc, extent=self.linkage.theta)
859        else:
860            self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.theta_arc, state='hidden')
861            
862        # update horizontal line
863        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.horizont_line, [A_x, A_y, A_x+3*radius_alpha, A_y])
864        
865        # update bars
866        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.AB_line, [A_x, A_y, B_x, B_y])
867        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.BC_line, [B_x, B_y, C_x, C_y])
868        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.CD_line, [C_x, C_y, D_x, D_y])
869        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.DA_line, [D_x, D_y, A_x, A_y])
870        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.CP_line, [C_x, C_y, P_x, P_y])
871        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.PD_line, [P_x, P_y, D_x, D_y])
872    
873        # update point's names
874        delta_x = round(0.012*self.model_animation.width)
875        delta_y = round(0.012*self.model_animation.height)
876        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.A_text, [A_x-delta_x, A_y+delta_y])
877        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.B_text, [B_x+delta_x, B_y+delta_y])
878        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.C_text, [C_x+delta_x, C_y-delta_y])
879        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.D_text, [D_x-delta_x, D_y-delta_y])
880        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.P_text, [P_x, P_y-np.sqrt(delta_y*delta_y+delta_x*delta_x)])
881        
882        # update angle's names
883        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.alpha_text,
884                                    [A_x + radius_alpha*np.cos(self.linkage.alpha_rad/2)+10,
885                                     A_y - radius_alpha*np.sin(self.linkage.alpha_rad/2)])
886        if self.linkage.theta!=0.0: 
887            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.theta_text,
888                                        [A_x + radius_theta*np.cos(self.linkage.theta_rad/2)+10,
889                                         A_y - radius_theta*np.sin(self.linkage.theta_rad/2)])
890        else:
891            self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.theta_text, state='hidden')
892        
893        # update bar's names
894        radius_names = round(scale*min(self.linkage.AB, self.linkage.BC, self.linkage.CD,
895                                       self.linkage.DA)/10)
896        # normalities to all bars to show their names
897        g, b, h, a = self.calculate_normalities()
898        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.DA_text, [round(radius_names*a[0]+(A_x+D_x)/2),
899                                                                   round(-radius_names*a[1]+(A_y+D_y)/2)])
900        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.AB_text, [round(radius_names*g[0]+(A_x+B_x)/2),
901                                                                   round(-radius_names*g[1]+(A_y+B_y)/2)])
902        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.BC_text, [round(radius_names*b[0]+(C_x+B_x)/2),
903                                                                   round(-radius_names*b[1]+(C_y+B_y)/2)])
904        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.CD_text, [round(radius_names*h[0]+(C_x+D_x)/2),
905                                                                   round(-radius_names*h[1]+(C_y+D_y)/2)])
906        
907        # save previous coupler position
908        self.prev_coupler_position = [P_x, P_y]
909        
910    # change slider limits for optimization problem
911    def change_slider_limits_optimization_problem(self):
912        self.slider_a.configure(from_=1., to=200., resolution=0.1)
913        self.slider_g.configure(from_=1., to=200., resolution=0.1)
914        self.slider_b.configure(from_=1., to=200., resolution=0.1)
915        self.slider_h.configure(from_=1., to=200., resolution=0.1)
916        self.slider_T1.configure(from_=-300., to=300., resolution=0.1)
917        self.slider_T2.configure(from_=-300., to=300., resolution=0.1)
918        self.slider_T3.configure(from_=-300., to=300., resolution=0.1)
919        self.slider_L.configure(from_=1., to=800., resolution=0.1)
920        
921    # change slider limits for normal mode
922    def change_slider_limits_normal(self):
923        self.slider_a.configure(from_=0.1, to=5., resolution=0.01)
924        self.slider_g.configure(from_=0.1, to=5., resolution=0.01)
925        self.slider_b.configure(from_=0.1, to=5., resolution=0.01)
926        self.slider_h.configure(from_=0.1, to=5., resolution=0.01)
927        self.slider_T1.configure(from_=-5., to=5., resolution=0.01)
928        self.slider_T2.configure(from_=-5., to=5., resolution=0.01)
929        self.slider_T3.configure(from_=-5., to=5., resolution=0.01)
930        self.slider_L.configure(from_=0.01, to=20., resolution=0.01)
931    
932    # update limits for alpha slider
933    def update_alpha_limits(self):
934        # round alpha limits to prevent errors
935        left_limit = np.ceil(self.linkage.alpha_lims[0])
936        right_limit = np.floor(self.linkage.alpha_lims[1])
937        self.slider_alpha.configure(from_=left_limit, to=right_limit)
938        # alpha should be always in alpha_lims
939        self.linkage.calculate_alpha_lims()
940        if self.linkage.alpha < self.linkage.alpha_lims[0] or \
941           self.linkage.alpha > self.linkage.alpha_lims[1]:
942            self.linkage.alpha = (self.linkage.alpha_lims[0] + self.linkage.alpha_lims[1])/2
943            self.linkage.alpha_rad = math.radians(self.linkage.alpha)
944        self.slider_alpha.set(self.linkage.alpha)
945        
946    # configure optimization problem
947    def config_optimization_problem(self):
948        if self.enable_optimization_problem.get():
949            self.show_optimization_problem()
950            self.change_slider_limits_optimization_problem()
951            self.show_A_x_A_y()
952            self.reset_A_x_A_y()
953            
954        else:
955            self.hide_optimization_problem()
956            self.change_slider_limits_normal()
957            self.hide_A_x_A_y()
958        
959        self.reset()
960        self.refresh()

 70                                                                 variable=self.input_classification_values,

 72                                                                 command=self.input_classification)
 73        self.input_classification_values_button.grid(sticky="W", row=0, column=2, columnspan=2)
 74        
 75        # exit button
 76        self.reset_button = tk.Button(self.toolbar_frame, text="Exit", command=self.tk.destroy)
 77        self.reset_button.grid(sticky="W", row=0, column=4)

 81        slider_width = round(0.85*self.toolbar_frame.width)

 84                                 orient=tk.HORIZONTAL, length=slider_width, label="a",

 86        self.slider_a.grid(sticky="W", row=1, column=1, columnspan=4)
 87        self.slider_g = tk.Scale(self.toolbar_frame, from_=0.1, to=5., resolution=0.01,
 88                                 orient=tk.HORIZONTAL, length=slider_width, label="g",
 89                                 command=self.update_parameter_g, variable=tk.DoubleVar())
 90        self.slider_g.grid(sticky="W", row=2, column=1, columnspan=4)
 91        self.slider_b = tk.Scale(self.toolbar_frame, from_=0.1, to=5., resolution=0.01,
 92                                 orient=tk.HORIZONTAL, length=slider_width, label="b",
 93                                 command=self.update_parameter_b, variable=tk.DoubleVar())
 94        self.slider_b.grid(sticky="W", row=3, column=1, columnspan=4)
 95        self.slider_h = tk.Scale(self.toolbar_frame, from_=0.1, to=5., resolution=0.01,
 96                                 orient=tk.HORIZONTAL, length=slider_width, label="h",
 97                                 command=self.update_parameter_h, variable=tk.DoubleVar())
 98        self.slider_h.grid(sticky="W", row=4, column=1, columnspan=4)
 99        # input classification values
100        self.slider_T1 = tk.Scale(self.toolbar_frame, from_=-5., to=5., resolution=0.01,
101                                  orient=tk.HORIZONTAL, length=slider_width, label="T1 = g + h - b - a",
102                                  command=self.update_parameter_T1, variable=tk.DoubleVar())
103        self.slider_T1.grid(sticky="W", row=1, column=1, columnspan=4)
104        self.slider_T2 = tk.Scale(self.toolbar_frame, from_=-5., to=5., resolution=0.01,
105                                  orient=tk.HORIZONTAL, length=slider_width, label="T2 = b + g - h - a",
106                                  command=self.update_parameter_T2, variable=tk.DoubleVar())
107        self.slider_T2.grid(sticky="W", row=2, column=1, columnspan=4)
108        self.slider_T3 = tk.Scale(self.toolbar_frame, from_=-5., to=5., resolution=0.01,
109                                  orient=tk.HORIZONTAL, length=slider_width, label="T3 = h + b - g - a",
110                                  command=self.update_parameter_T3, variable=tk.DoubleVar())
111        self.slider_T3.grid(sticky="W", row=3, column=1, columnspan=4)
112        self.slider_L = tk.Scale(self.toolbar_frame, from_=0.01, to=20., resolution=0.01,
113                                 orient=tk.HORIZONTAL, length=slider_width, label="L  = g + b + h + a",
114                                 command=self.update_parameter_L, variable=tk.DoubleVar())
115        self.slider_L.grid(sticky="W", row=4, column=1, columnspan=4)
116        # hide first classification sliders
117        self.hide_classification_sliders()
118        
119        # input further params
120        self.slider_p_pos = tk.Scale(self.toolbar_frame, from_=-200., to=200., orient=tk.HORIZONTAL,
121                                     length=slider_width, label="P_pos % in CD",
122                                     command=self.update_parameter_p_pos, variable=tk.DoubleVar())
123        self.slider_p_pos.grid(sticky="W", row=5, column=1, columnspan=4)
124        self.slider_p_off = tk.Scale(self.toolbar_frame, from_=-200., to=200., orient=tk.HORIZONTAL,
125                                     length=slider_width, label="P_offset % in CD",
126                                     command=self.update_parameter_p_off, variable=tk.DoubleVar())
127        self.slider_p_off.grid(sticky="W", row=6, column=1, columnspan=4)
128        self.slider_alpha = tk.Scale(self.toolbar_frame, from_=-180, to=180, orient=tk.HORIZONTAL,
129                                     length=slider_width, label=", ",
130                                     command=self.update_parameter_alpha, variable=tk.DoubleVar())
131        self.slider_alpha.grid(sticky="W", row=7, column=1, columnspan=4)
132        # instantly update alpha limits
133        self.update_alpha_limits()
134        # additional sliders for optimization problem (position of A)
135        self.slider_A_x = tk.Scale(self.toolbar_frame, from_=-100., to=300., resolution=0.1, orient=tk.HORIZONTAL,
136                                   length=round(0.49*slider_width), label="A_x",
137                                   command=self.update_parameter_A_x, variable=tk.DoubleVar())
138        self.slider_A_x.grid(sticky="W", row=7, column=1, columnspan=2)
139        self.slider_A_y = tk.Scale(self.toolbar_frame, from_=-100, to=100, resolution=0.1, orient=tk.HORIZONTAL,
140                                   length=round(0.49*slider_width), label="A_y",
141                                   command=self.update_parameter_A_y, variable=tk.DoubleVar())
142        self.slider_A_y.grid(sticky="W", row=7, column=3, columnspan=2)
143        # hide A_x and A_y
144        self.hide_A_x_A_y()
145        # slider for theta
146        self.slider_theta = tk.Scale(self.toolbar_frame, from_=-180., to=180., orient=tk.HORIZONTAL,
147                                     length=slider_width, label=", ",
148                                     command=self.update_parameter_theta, variable=tk.DoubleVar())
149        self.slider_theta.grid(sticky="W", row=8, column=1, columnspan=4)
150        # reset all sliders with current values
151        self.reset_bars_sliders()
152        
153        # classification values
154        self.text_classification_values = tk.Text(self.toolbar_frame, height=4, 
155                                                  width=30, bd=0, bg="grey94")
156        self.text_classification_values.grid(sticky="W", row=9, column=1, columnspan=4)
157        
158        # bar values
159        self.text_bars_values = tk.Text(self.toolbar_frame, height=4, 
160                                        width=30, bd=0, bg="grey94")
161        self.text_bars_values.grid(sticky="W", row=9, column=1, columnspan=4)
162        # hide bars values firstly
163        self.hide_bars_values()
164        
165        # initialize reset button
166        self.reset_button = tk.Button(self.toolbar_frame, text="reset", command=self.reset)
167        self.reset_button.grid(sticky="W", row=10, column=1)
168        
169        # initialize checkbuttons with necessary text
170        self.enable_animation = tk.IntVar()
171        self.animation_button = tk.Checkbutton(self.toolbar_frame, text="animation", 
172                                               variable=self.enable_animation,
173                                               onvalue=1, offvalue=0, command=self.animation)
174        self.animation_button.grid(sticky="W", row=10, column=2)
175        self.enable_optimization_problem = tk.IntVar()
176        self.optimization_problem_button = tk.Checkbutton(self.toolbar_frame, text="optimization problem", 
177                                                          variable=self.enable_optimization_problem,

def scaling_factor(self): 
333    def scaling_factor(self):
334        # fix scale for optimization problem
335        if self.enable_optimization_problem.get():
336            scale = min(float(self.model_animation.width)/400,
337                        float(self.model_animation.height)/350)
338            return scale
339        # max length in x direction
340        # links AB and CD
341        max_x = np.abs(np.cos(self.linkage.theta_rad))*max(self.linkage.AB, self.linkage.CD)
342        # links DA and BC
343        horizontal_value = max(self.linkage.DA, self.linkage.BC)
344        # always factor of two for symmetry of generated picture
345        max_x += 2*horizontal_value
346        # point P
347        max_x += 2*max(np.sqrt(self.linkage.coupler_position**2 +\
348                               self.linkage.coupler_offset**2)*self.linkage.CD, 0.0)
349        # max length in y direction
350        # links AB and CD
351        max_y = np.abs(np.sin(self.linkage.theta_rad))*max(self.linkage.AB, self.linkage.CD)
352        # links DA and BC
353        vertical_value = max(self.linkage.DA, self.linkage.BC)
354        # always factor of two for symmetry of generated picture
355        max_y += 2*vertical_value
356        # point P
357        max_y += 2*max(np.sqrt(self.linkage.coupler_position**2 +\
358                               self.linkage.coupler_offset**2)*self.linkage.CD, 0.0)
359        # scaling factor for point coordinates
360        scale = min(float(self.model_animation.width)/max_x,
361                    float(self.model_animation.height)/max_y)
362        return scale
def calculate_normalities(self): 
365    def calculate_normalities(self):
366        AB = self.linkage.B - self.linkage.A
367        BC = self.linkage.C - self.linkage.B
368        CD = self.linkage.D - self.linkage.C
369        DA = self.linkage.A - self.linkage.D
370        n_AB = [AB[1], -AB[0]]/np.linalg.norm(AB)
371        n_BC = [BC[1], -BC[0]]/np.linalg.norm(BC)
372        n_CD = [CD[1], -CD[0]]/np.linalg.norm(CD)
373        n_DA = [DA[1], -DA[0]]/np.linalg.norm(DA)
374        return n_AB, n_BC, n_CD, n_DA

def refresh(self): 
440    def refresh(self):
441        # set new alpha limits

443        # calculate points position
444        self.linkage.run()

def reset(self): 
453    def reset(self):
454        if self.enable_optimization_problem.get():
455            # solution of optimization problem
456            self.linkage = FourBarLinkage(172.1, 171.2, 122.6, 124.0, 45., -70., 0.2, 0.42, 0.025, 20)
457            self.A_x = 27.0
458            self.A_y = 66.0
459            self.reset_A_x_A_y()
460            self.linkage.direction = 1
461        else:
462            # default config
463            self.linkage = FourBarLinkage(3., 1.41, 1., 1.41, 45., 0., 0.25, 0.3, 0.025, 20)
464        # reset all the sliders and info
465        self.reset_bars_sliders()
466        self.reset_classifications_sliders()
467        # delete saved tracing info
468        self.delete_tracing()
469        # generate new image
470        self.refresh()

618        self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.D_text, state='hidden')
619        self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.P_text, state='hidden')
620        self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.alpha_text, state='hidden')
621        self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.theta_text, state='hidden')
622        self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.DA_text, state='hidden')
623        self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.AB_text, state='hidden')
624        self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.BC_text, state='hidden')
625        self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.CD_text, state='hidden')

def animation(self):

def run_animation(self): 
670    def run_animation(self):
671        if self.enable_animation.get():
672            self.linkage.animation_alpha()
673            self.refresh()
674            self.tk.after(25, self.run_animation)
def delete_tracing(self): 
698    def delete_tracing(self):
699        self.positions_C = []
700        self.positions_D = []
701        self.positions_P = []
def update_linkage_display(self): 
703    def update_linkage_display(self):
704        # check if setup is valid
705        if self.linkage.geometric_Validity:
706            # show linkage
707            self.show_linkage()
708            if self.enable_optimization_problem.get():
709                # show optimization problem
710                self.show_optimization_problem()
711            # hide error message
712            self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.invalid_text, state='hidden')
713        else:
714            # hide linkage
715            self.hide_linkage()
716            # hide optimization problem
717            self.hide_optimization_problem()
718            # show error message
719            self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.invalid_text, state='normal')
720            return
721        
722        # scaling factor to transfrom spatial coordinates to pixels
723        scale = self.scaling_factor()
724        # Mid point in AB should be always placed in center for symmetry (except of optimization problem)
725        AB_mid = (self.linkage.A + self.linkage.B)/2
726        AB_mid_x = round(self.model_animation.width/2)
727        AB_mid_y = round(self.model_animation.height/2)
728        # Point A is a bias and positioned relative to AB_mid
729        A_x = 0
730        A_y = 0
731        # in case of optimization problem A_x and A_y are moved with respect to coordinates x, y
732        if self.enable_optimization_problem.get():
733            x = round(self.x_axis*scale)
734            y = round(self.y_axis*scale)
735            A_x = round(self.A_x*scale) + x
736            A_y = - round(self.A_y*scale) + y
737        else:
738            A_x = round(AB_mid_x - AB_mid[0]*scale)
739            A_y = round(AB_mid_y + AB_mid[1]*scale)
740        # Point B relative to A
741        B_x = round(A_x + (self.linkage.B[0]-self.linkage.A[0])*scale)
742        B_y = round(A_y - (self.linkage.B[1]-self.linkage.A[1])*scale)
743        # Point C relative to A
744        C_x = round(A_x + (self.linkage.C[0]-self.linkage.A[0])*scale)
745        C_y = round(A_y - (self.linkage.C[1]-self.linkage.A[1])*scale)
746        # Point D relative to A
747        D_x = round(A_x + (self.linkage.D[0]-self.linkage.A[0])*scale)
748        D_y = round(A_y - (self.linkage.D[1]-self.linkage.A[1])*scale)
749        # Point P relative to A
750        P_x = round(A_x + (self.linkage.P[0]-self.linkage.A[0])*scale)
751        P_y = round(A_y - (self.linkage.P[1]-self.linkage.A[1])*scale)
752        
753        # show optimization problem
754        if self.enable_optimization_problem.get():
755            # axis position
756            x = round(self.x_axis*scale)
757            y = round(self.y_axis*scale)
758            # generate all figures and text
759            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.movement_line, [0, y, self.model_animation.width, y])
760            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.x_axis, [x, y, x, y-40*scale])
761            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.x_0, [x, y+5*scale, x, y+25*scale])
762            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.x_0_text, [x+10*scale, y+15*scale])
763            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.x_220, [x+220*scale, y+5*scale, x+220*scale, y+25*scale])
764            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.x_220_text, [x+235*scale, y+15*scale])
765            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.y_axis, [x, y, x+40*scale, y])
766            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.label_rectangle, [x+80*scale, y-70*scale, x-160*scale, y-120*scale])
767            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.labelling_machine_text, [x-40*scale, y-95*scale])
768            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.text_80_70, [x+95*scale, y-70*scale])
769            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.point_1, [x+119*scale, y-81*scale, x+121*scale, y-79*scale])
770            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.text_120_80, [x+120*scale, y-87*scale])
771            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.point_2, [x+219*scale, y-81*scale, x+221*scale, y-79*scale])
772            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.text_220_80, [x+221*scale, y-87*scale])
773            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.box_rectangle_dashed, [x+140*scale, y, x+220*scale, y-60*scale])
774            # save previous box position
775            if self.prev_box_position is None:
776                self.prev_box_position = [x+140*scale, y, x+220*scale, y-60*scale]
777            # position of text "Box"
778            box_text_position = [round((self.prev_box_position[0]+self.prev_box_position[2])/2),
779                                 round((self.prev_box_position[1]+self.prev_box_position[3])/2)]
780            # decide if box is moved by coupler or remains at place
781            if self.pin_box_to_coupler and self.prev_coupler_position is not None:
782                # save next box position
783                self.prev_box_position = [P_x-80*scale, y, P_x, y-60*scale]
784                self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.box_rectangle, self.prev_box_position)
785                self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.box_text, box_text_position)
786                # unpin box
787                if self.prev_coupler_position[0] < P_x:
788                    self.pin_box_to_coupler = False
789                if P_y > y or P_y < y - 60*scale:
790                    self.pin_box_to_coupler = False
791            else:
792                self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.box_rectangle, self.prev_box_position)
793                self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.box_text, box_text_position)
794                # pin box
795                if self.prev_coupler_position is not None and self.prev_coupler_position[0] >= x+220*scale and \
796                   P_x <= x+220*scale and P_y <= y and P_y >= y - 60*scale:
797                    self.pin_box_to_coupler = True
798        
799        # tracing
800        # number of points to trace (factor of 10 makes sure to save full trajectory)
801        N_points = 10*round((self.linkage.alpha_lims[1]-self.linkage.alpha_lims[0])/ \
802                   (self.linkage.alpha_velocity * self.linkage.t))
803        # trace C
804        if self.trace_C:
805            if len(self.positions_C)<=N_points:
806                self.positions_C.append(C_x)
807                self.positions_C.append(C_y)
808            if len(self.positions_C)>2:
809                # show C trajectory
810                self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.trace_C, state='normal')
811                self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.trace_C, self.positions_C)
812            else:
813                self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.trace_C, state='hidden')
814        else:
815            # hide C trajectory
816            self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.trace_C, state='hidden')
817        # trace D
818        if self.trace_D:
819            if len(self.positions_D)<=N_points:
820                self.positions_D.append(D_x)
821                self.positions_D.append(D_y)
822            if len(self.positions_D)>2:
823                # show D trajectory
824                self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.trace_D, state='normal')
825                self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.trace_D, self.positions_D)
826            else:
827                # hide D trajectory
828                self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.trace_D, state='hidden')
829        else:
830            self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.trace_D, state='hidden')
831        # trace P   
832        if self.trace_P:
833            if len(self.positions_P)<=N_points:
834                self.positions_P.append(P_x)
835                self.positions_P.append(P_y)
836            if len(self.positions_P)>2:
837                # show P trajectory
838                self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.trace_P, state='normal')
839                self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.trace_P, self.positions_P)
840            else:
841                # hide P trajectory
842                self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.trace_P, state='hidden')
843        else:
844            self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.trace_P, state='hidden')
845
846        # update arc alpha
847        radius_alpha = round(min(self.width/30, self.linkage.AB*scale, self.linkage.DA*scale))
848        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.alpha_arc, [A_x-radius_alpha, A_y-radius_alpha,
849                                                                     A_x+radius_alpha, A_y+radius_alpha])
850        self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.alpha_arc, extent=self.linkage.alpha)
851        
852        # update arc theta
853        radius_theta = round(min(self.width/20, self.linkage.AB*scale))
854        # show only if theta is non zero
855        if self.linkage.theta!=0:            
856            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.theta_arc, [A_x-radius_theta, A_y-radius_theta,
857                                                                         A_x+radius_theta, A_y+radius_theta])
858            self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.theta_arc, extent=self.linkage.theta)
859        else:
860            self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.theta_arc, state='hidden')
861            
862        # update horizontal line
863        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.horizont_line, [A_x, A_y, A_x+3*radius_alpha, A_y])
864        
865        # update bars
866        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.AB_line, [A_x, A_y, B_x, B_y])
867        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.BC_line, [B_x, B_y, C_x, C_y])
868        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.CD_line, [C_x, C_y, D_x, D_y])
869        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.DA_line, [D_x, D_y, A_x, A_y])
870        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.CP_line, [C_x, C_y, P_x, P_y])
871        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.PD_line, [P_x, P_y, D_x, D_y])
872    
873        # update point's names
874        delta_x = round(0.012*self.model_animation.width)
875        delta_y = round(0.012*self.model_animation.height)
876        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.A_text, [A_x-delta_x, A_y+delta_y])
877        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.B_text, [B_x+delta_x, B_y+delta_y])
878        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.C_text, [C_x+delta_x, C_y-delta_y])
879        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.D_text, [D_x-delta_x, D_y-delta_y])
880        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.P_text, [P_x, P_y-np.sqrt(delta_y*delta_y+delta_x*delta_x)])
881        
882        # update angle's names
883        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.alpha_text,
884                                    [A_x + radius_alpha*np.cos(self.linkage.alpha_rad/2)+10,
885                                     A_y - radius_alpha*np.sin(self.linkage.alpha_rad/2)])
886        if self.linkage.theta!=0.0: 
887            self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.theta_text,
888                                        [A_x + radius_theta*np.cos(self.linkage.theta_rad/2)+10,
889                                         A_y - radius_theta*np.sin(self.linkage.theta_rad/2)])
890        else:
891            self.model_animation.itemconfigure(self.model_animation.theta_text, state='hidden')
892        
893        # update bar's names
894        radius_names = round(scale*min(self.linkage.AB, self.linkage.BC, self.linkage.CD,
895                                       self.linkage.DA)/10)
896        # normalities to all bars to show their names
897        g, b, h, a = self.calculate_normalities()
898        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.DA_text, [round(radius_names*a[0]+(A_x+D_x)/2),
899                                                                   round(-radius_names*a[1]+(A_y+D_y)/2)])
900        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.AB_text, [round(radius_names*g[0]+(A_x+B_x)/2),
901                                                                   round(-radius_names*g[1]+(A_y+B_y)/2)])
902        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.BC_text, [round(radius_names*b[0]+(C_x+B_x)/2),
903                                                                   round(-radius_names*b[1]+(C_y+B_y)/2)])
904        self.model_animation.coords(self.model_animation.CD_text, [round(radius_names*h[0]+(C_x+D_x)/2),
905                                                                   round(-radius_names*h[1]+(C_y+D_y)/2)])
906        
907        # save previous coupler position
908        self.prev_coupler_position = [P_x, P_y]
def change_slider_limits_optimization_problem(self): 
911    def change_slider_limits_optimization_problem(self):
912        self.slider_a.configure(from_=1., to=200., resolution=0.1)
913        self.slider_g.configure(from_=1., to=200., resolution=0.1)
914        self.slider_b.configure(from_=1., to=200., resolution=0.1)
915        self.slider_h.configure(from_=1., to=200., resolution=0.1)
916        self.slider_T1.configure(from_=-300., to=300., resolution=0.1)
917        self.slider_T2.configure(from_=-300., to=300., resolution=0.1)
918        self.slider_T3.configure(from_=-300., to=300., resolution=0.1)
919        self.slider_L.configure(from_=1., to=800., resolution=0.1)
def change_slider_limits_normal(self): 
922    def change_slider_limits_normal(self):
923        self.slider_a.configure(from_=0.1, to=5., resolution=0.01)
924        self.slider_g.configure(from_=0.1, to=5., resolution=0.01)
925        self.slider_b.configure(from_=0.1, to=5., resolution=0.01)
926        self.slider_h.configure(from_=0.1, to=5., resolution=0.01)
927        self.slider_T1.configure(from_=-5., to=5., resolution=0.01)
928        self.slider_T2.configure(from_=-5., to=5., resolution=0.01)
929        self.slider_T3.configure(from_=-5., to=5., resolution=0.01)
930        self.slider_L.configure(from_=0.01, to=20., resolution=0.01)
def update_alpha_limits(self): 
933    def update_alpha_limits(self):
934        # round alpha limits to prevent errors
935        left_limit = np.ceil(self.linkage.alpha_lims[0])
936        right_limit = np.floor(self.linkage.alpha_lims[1])
937        self.slider_alpha.configure(from_=left_limit, to=right_limit)
938        # alpha should be always in alpha_lims
939        self.linkage.calculate_alpha_lims()
940        if self.linkage.alpha < self.linkage.alpha_lims[0] or \
941           self.linkage.alpha > self.linkage.alpha_lims[1]:
942            self.linkage.alpha = (self.linkage.alpha_lims[0] + self.linkage.alpha_lims[1])/2
943            self.linkage.alpha_rad = math.radians(self.linkage.alpha)
944        self.slider_alpha.set(self.linkage.alpha)
def config_optimization_problem(self): 
947    def config_optimization_problem(self):
948        if self.enable_optimization_problem.get():
949            self.show_optimization_problem()
950            self.change_slider_limits_optimization_problem()
951            self.show_A_x_A_y()
952            self.reset_A_x_A_y()
953            
954        else:
955            self.hide_optimization_problem()
956            self.change_slider_limits_normal()
957            self.hide_A_x_A_y()
958        
959        self.reset()
960        self.refresh()
